Unable to sign in.
In order to identify each player and back up all saved game data, Magic Rampage needs permission to access your Contacts and retrieve Account Identification.
The permission to retrieve your account identification was denied. Saved games are not being backed up.
Magic Rampage needs access to the external storage in order to install additional expansion files.
Magic Rampage needs access to the external storage in order to save local game data, such as progress and preferences.
The permission to write to external storage was denied. Saved game progress may not work properly.
Enable permissions in the app\'s Settings page.
Go to Settings
Type your friend\'s nickname
There was an issue with sign-in, please try again later.
Failed to sign in. Please check your network connection and try again.

The application is incorrectly configured. Check that the package name and signing certificate match the client ID created in Developer Console. Also, if the application is not yet published, check that the account you are trying to sign in with is listed as a tester account. See logs for more information.
License check failed.
Unknown error.
Failed to sign in. Please open the Play Games app from Google to sign in.
